name: Adventures of a Lonely Pixel (LD51 Original Version)
name_original: Adventures of a Lonely Pixel (LD51 Original Version)
description:
Original version of the LD51 game!

See the Ludum Dare page for the bug-fixed version

You're trapped! Find your way out of the digital prison, and be careful not to be caught moving when the scanner comes across!

Controls

A/D or left/right arrow keys for movement  

Space to jump (hold longer for a higher jump!)  

Space, Space to double-jump
